name.description: Name/label for this floater (for admin reference)

description.description: Optional description of what this floater does

image_url.description: URL to the image to display

action_type.description: Action to perform when clicked: call webhook, redirect to URL, or open a form

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL to call when clicked (required if action_type is webhook)

redirect_url.description: URL to navigate to when clicked (required if action_type is url)

form_slug.description: Form slug to open when clicked (required if action_type is form)

window_target.description: For URL action: how to open the URL

popup_width.description: Width of popup window (only used when window_target is popup)

popup_height.description: Height of popup window (only used when window_target is popup)

offset_x.description: Horizontal offset from edge in pixels

offset_y.description: Vertical offset from edge in pixels

width.description: Width of the floater in pixels

height.description: Height of the floater in pixels

show_background.description: Whether to show rounded background and shadow (true) or just the image (false)

is_active.description: Whether this floater is currently active

click_count.description: Number of times this floater has been clicked

display_order.description: Display order for multiple floaters (lower numbers appear first)
